parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking or splitting of the dashboard can compromise the structural integrity of the airbag system, potentially leading to malfunction or failure in the event of an accident, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The dashboard develops a small slit or crack
which gradually grows in size over time
often near the passenger-side airbag.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The detachment of trim or components, such as the front hood trim or vacuum lid, can cause unexpected crashes or injuries if they strike another vehicle or a person.
symptoms: Trim or components suddenly detach while driving or during normal use
potentially causing damage or injury.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of sub-frame bushings can affect the steering and transmission systems, potentially leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences issues with steering or transmission
which can cause the parts to lock up
leading to loss of control or accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to the failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag light comes on and stays on
the airbag module needs to be replaced
the front passenger airbag is defective and needs to be replaced
the passenger seat airbag squib has an open fault.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The clockspring recall issue can cause the airbag system to malfunction, leading to the failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag light comes on and stays on
the airbag system malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A fuel system leak can cause a fire hazard, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: Gas smell in the winter when starting the car
unable to find a leak despite visiting several places.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the horn can reduce the ability to alert other drivers or pedestrians, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The horn does not work.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the visibility wipers can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The visibility wipers are not working properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag clock spring can cause the airbag to malfunction, leading to potential injuries or fatalities in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The airbag warning light is illuminated
the airbag system is inoperative
the turn signals and horn are malfunctioning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failure can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to potential accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The interior lights blink on and off
the battery drains
the vehicle cuts off while driving
the electrical system malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition/park interlock can cause the vehicle to move unexpectedly, leading to potential accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle can be pulled out of park at any time
the ignition system malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition cylinder can cause the vehicle to be unable to start, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The key in the ignition won't turn
the ignition cylinder is damaged
the vehicle cannot be started.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, particularly at low speeds or when navigating tight turns.
symptoms: Squeaky or loose steering wheel
steering wheel comes off the column
intermittent steering issues
difficulty steering
loss of power steering assist
horn malfunction
cruise control malfunction
and other button malfunctions behind the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clockspring can cause airbag malfunctions, horn malfunctions, and other electrical issues, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Airbag light illumination
horn malfunction
cruise control malfunction
and other button malfunctions behind the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering box can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, particularly at low speeds or when navigating tight turns.
symptoms: Squeaky or loose steering wheel
intermittent steering issues
difficulty steering
loss of power steering assist.
